metadata.title: CVE-2017-18255 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The perf_cpu_time_max_percent_handler function in kernel/events/core.c inthe Linux kernel before 4.11 allows local users to cause a denial ofservice (integer overflow) or possibly have unspecified other impact via alarge value, as demonstrated by an incorrect sample-rate calculation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18255` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-130-generic - 4.4.0-130.156
linux-image-4.4.0-130-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-130.156
